attributes.action: ban all pointless online petitions that the pm himself or cabinet will take no notice of anyway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: basically, there has been a boom of online petitions in the vain hope of getting the message across to the 'voted' representatives of the people of this country as to what WE really care about. But my own feeling is that they are pointless as the government will just continue on its blinkered way irrespective of the feelings of those that put it in power.

rejection.details: You feedback is welcome, but we don't accept e-petitions about e-petitions
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
